title: The Courtesan's Secret
description: Second in the ?cleverly orchestrated,?( Library Journal ) Regencyset series featuring the matchmaking schemes of an infamous ex-courtesan.On the night of her debut two years ago, Lady Louisa Kirkland fell for the devilish Marquis of Dutton. It?s high time, she?s decided, that he realized he loves her. Also, there is the matter of Louisa?s family pearls, which are in his possession. For both problems, Louisa will need the help of Lady Sophia, an ex-courtesan more clever than all the other ton matrons combined?
author: Claudia Dain
